channel.title: Scronix PK | 317 PK
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/logo2_zpsd60077b9.png[/img]
NOTE: This thread has originally been posted by me on RSWebclients.
Scronix is now a PK Server, we decided to change our Eco source to PK. For the original thread go to: http://www.rswebclients.com/forum/Thread-Scronix-Revival-of-Good-Old-Times
[b]FEATURES[/b]
[i]Server Side[/i] Perfect Combat PK Outside Barbarian Village Funpk (Currently disabled due bugs) 100% Barrows Duel Arena (ALL dupes fixed) 24/7 Staff Support Cricital Attacks (Ranging and Melee) Corporeal Beast Lottery Loyalty Titles PK Supplies (Achievement Tab) Customized shops Unique donator zone Unique staff zone 100% Tzhaar Cave Warrior Guild 80% Chaos Elemental 100% Dicing Master, Pure & Setlevel commands Most Bugs fixed Curses
[i]Website Side[/i] 100% Auto Donate 100% Vote4Reward SMF 2.0.2 Forums Paid Webhost/Domain Easy Website Navigation
[b]MEDIA[/b]
[i]Video[/i] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V_4m9wtznMc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[i]Pictures[/i] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/1-kopie_zpsc2c5a1f6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/2_zps341e4567.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/4_zpsd2f56059.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/5_zps793f722f.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/6_zpsfa9cc09e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/7_zpsfca26215.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/8_zps0a19b301.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/9_zps76944658.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/10_zps84e00991.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/11_zps8779afbb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/12_zpsdcbf5de8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/13_zpse6bf5ed1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/14_zpse5a855bc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa470/Partyhad/15_zps758b8cfb.jpg[/img]
For more pictures look at the original thread.
[b]LINKS[/b]
Home: [url=http://scronix.org/]Scronix - Revival of Good, Old Times.[/url] Forums: [url=http://scronix.org/community/]Scronix[/url] Webclient: [url=http://scronix.org/webclient/]Scronix - Play Now![/url] Vote: [url=http://scronix.org/vote.php/]Scronix - Vote 4 A Reward[/url] AutoDonate: [url=http://scronix.org/donate/donate.php]Scronix - Donate[/url]
Thank you for reading. We hope to see you soon at Scronix![/center]

item.title: Scronix PK | 317 PK
item.dc:creator: @RuneOnline RuneOnline
item.description:
@RuneOnline wrote:

[quote=“TrisidiaX, post:2, topic:462199”][quote author=CoderJessee link=topic=565155.msg4112497#msg4112497 date=1348670768]
[center]

NOTE: This thread has originally been posted by me on RSWebclients.

Scronix is now a PK Server, we decided to change our Eco source to PK. For the original thread go to: http://www.rswebclients.com/forum/Thread-Scronix-Revival-of-Good-Old-Times

FEATURES

Server Side
Perfect Combat
PK Outside Barbarian Village
Funpk (Currently disabled due bugs)
100% Barrows
Duel Arena (ALL dupes fixed)
24/7 Staff Support
Cricital Attacks (Ranging and Melee)
Corporeal Beast
Lottery
Loyalty Titles
PK Supplies (Achievement Tab)
Customized shops
Unique donator zone
Unique staff zone
100% Tzhaar Cave
Warrior Guild
80% Chaos Elemental
100% Dicing
Master, Pure & Setlevel commands
Most Bugs fixed
Curses

Website Side
100% Auto Donate
100% Vote4Reward
SMF 2.0.2 Forums
Paid Webhost/Domain
Easy Website Navigation
